name: Flatwoods Monster
modifier: At the start of the game, shuffle the drone deck and place it face-down near the shop. Once per turn, either player can gain a drone, at the cost of 1 suspicion.
ability: Erase two drones in your hand to gain a shop card for free.

name: Loveland Frog
modifier: At the start of the game, take your Magic Die and place it in a convenient location.
